data:
Facsimile Images

[---]ΚΙΑΓΙΑ
[---]Ω ἡμιλίτριον
[---τ]άλαντον
[---]ΝΤΑ τρία

Apparatus criticus

Text after Manganaro 1999 ; Orsi: τάλ]αντα; Arangio-Ruiz: τά]λ̣αντα
2: Orsi correctly read the final two letters of line 2, which turn right down the margin of the bronze, but wrongly attributed them to the end of lines 3 and 4 as Ο and Ζ respectively (followed by Arangio-Ruiz)
4: Manganaro speculates on a fifth line reading τάλαντα, but given that the lower margin is complete, this would be on the missing left part (with limited space)

translation

commentary

bibliography

    49.1313.B https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796 Orsi 1900 53 no. 22 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001707 Arangio-Ruiz and Olivieri 1925 129 no. 14.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001378 Manganaro 1999 61 no. 48 fig. 129a-b https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001813
    180 n. 7 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000160

Apparatus criticus

Text after Manganaro 1999 ; Orsi: τάλ]αντα; Arangio-Ruiz: τά]λ̣αντα
2: Orsi correctly read the final two letters of line 2, which turn right down the margin of the bronze, but wrongly attributed them to the end of lines 3 and 4 as Ο and Ζ respectively (followed by Arangio-Ruiz)
4: Manganaro speculates on a fifth line reading τάλαντα, but given that the lower margin is complete, this would be on the missing left part (with limited space)
